attributes.action: Restore disciplin in schools and teach students the value of respect of themselves and others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disciplin and respect in schools has declined over the past 30 years.  This decline has accelerated and continued to accelerate over the past five years.  The Government is only interested in exam results and if these are good all other aspect of school life are left to their own devices  We call on the Prime Minister to restore triditional values, respect and disciplin to all of our schools as a matter of urgency and instruct OFSTED to take into account all aspect of school life, including disciplin and the respect shown by students into account when compiling their report.
